subclusters.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
Telomere Dysfunction in Premature Aging Syndromes Theory
Telomere-Mediated Tumor Suppression and Senescence Theory
Telomere Maintenance and Longevity Decoupling Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere shortening triggering replicative senescence and telomerase extending cell lifespan, emphasizing telomere length as a mitotic clock.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere shortening causing DNA damage checkpoint activation leading to cellular senescence, highlighting telomere dysfunction as intrinsic aging mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Presents telomeres as mitotic clock with shortening leading to senescence and telomerase maintaining length, fitting the molecular clock theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere shortening triggering senescence and telomerase/ALT maintaining telomeres, consistent with molecular clock mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details telomere shortening as mitotic clock triggering replicative senescence and telomerase reactivation enabling immortalization.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes end-replication problem causing telomere shortening acting as mitotic clock triggering senescence, with telomerase maintaining length.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Models telomere shortening as stochastic process limiting cell division, emphasizing shortest telomere as determinant of replicative potential.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere rate of change correlating with species longevity, emphasizing dynamic telomere shortening as aging determinant.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Models telomere shortening and telomerase activity in cell populations, linking telomere length dynamics to replicative senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses heritability and environmental effects on telomere length and shortening, supporting telomere length as aging biomarker and causal factor.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere shortening limiting hematopoietic stem cell replicative capacity, fitting telomere shortening as molecular clock theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links telomere length shortening to organismal aging and body size trade-offs, consistent with telomere shortening as aging mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows infectious disease and inflammation accelerate telomere attrition causing cellular senescence, fitting telomere shortening aging mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes stress-induced acceleration of telomere shortening and cross-generational effects, emphasizing telomere shortening as aging driver.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes ancestral telomere shortening as biological countdown limiting lifespan, consistent with telomere shortening molecular clock concept.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Driven Reproductive Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere shortening in oocytes causing meiotic errors and reproductive aging, a distinct germline telomere aging mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Driven Reproductive Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details telomere shortening causing meiotic dysfunction in female germ cells, supporting telomere role in reproductive aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction in Premature Aging Syndromes Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes WRN helicase role in telomere maintenance and dysfunction causing premature aging, linking telomere dysfunction to progeroid syndromes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction in Premature Aging Syndromes Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on asymmetric division and extrachromosomal rDNA circles causing replicative aging in yeast, a telomere-related dysfunction aging model.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction and Metabolic Alteration Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links telomere attrition-induced dysfunction to cellular senescence and systemic metabolic changes, highlighting metabolic consequences of telomere dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Mediated Tumor Suppression and Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes telomere shortening triggering replicative senescence as tumor suppression mechanism, with species differences in telomerase regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Mediated Tumor Suppression and Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes evolutionary adaptation of telomere length to balance cancer risk and longevity, supporting telomere role in tumor suppression.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Maintenance and Longevity Decoupling Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows termite telomere length maintained by telomerase independent of aging, challenging telomere shortening as universal aging mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Maintenance and Longevity Decoupling Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes telomere integrity maintenance via recombination or compensatory mechanisms enables clonal lineage longevity, decoupling telomere shortening from aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening as Molecular Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on replicative senescence in placenta driven by accumulation of short telomeres and telomere dysfunction-induced DNA damage foci.
